description: Intermediate German vocabulary - complex topics for independent communication

emotions.name: Emotions & Feelings
emotions.description: Express complex emotions and states of mind

professional.name: Professional Life
professional.description: Vocabulary for work and career discussions

words.exampleTranslation: My employer offers flexible working hours.

connectors.name: Connectors & Conjunctions
connectors.description: Link ideas and create complex sentences
